fulltext:
Profile 
•9 years of working experience in Fintech and Consulting with some of the 
biggest names in the respective fields: Ant Financial, EY and PwC 
•International professional exposure across South East Asia and the UK. 
Comfortable working in diverse, multi-cultures, multi-locations environments, 
Experience 
Senior Product Manager, Ant Financial 2017- Present 
Location: Vietnam/Singapore 
Member of the Ant Financial International Product team responsible for providing  
payment capabilities to Lazada and other Alibaba Group globalization ventures 
(Daraz, Trendyol, etc.). 
Currently in charge of more than a dozen Lazada payment channels in The 
Philippines, Indonesia and Vietnam. Worked on the very first version of the 
Lazada e-Wallet. 
Responsibilities: 
•Own KPI of payment channels Conversion/Success Rate 
•Participate in the selection of new payment partners; represent Alipay in 
direct product discussion and negotiation. 
•Define product features based on understanding of users, competition 
landscape and technical aspects 
•Ensure product design satisfy internal and external stakeholders’ 
requirements: Merchant, FI, Finance, Risk, Compliance and Operation. 
•Work directly with technical teams during development 
•Continuously monitor and make data-driven decisions to enhance the 
products 
Product Owner, GoBear  2016- 2017 
Location: Vietnam/Singapore 
Key member of the GoBear IT & Development team in Singapore and the local 
team which launched GoBear.com in Vietnam. As Product Owner in a Scrum 
environment, I am the owner of the product backlog for GoBear Vietnam with 
the responsibility of refining and prioritizing user stories to continuously add 
values to the product. On a daily basis, I work closely with various functional 
teams (Product, Business Development, Marketing, Development) across 
multiple locations (Vietnam, Singapore and China) to define optimal product 
features and solve practical business problems.  
ddminh@gmail.com 
Skype: dsminh_dang 
LB 16.11 Lexington 
Residence 
67 Mai Chi Tho 
District 2 
Ho Chi Minh City* 
*willing to relocate 
�1
+84 936 426 286 
DANG DUC MINH
Assistant Manager, TechcomBank Internal Audit — 2015-2016 
Location: Vietnam 
Primary role in internal consulting and assurance engagements on IT projects, 
systems and governance practices to ensure that IT initiatives and resources are 
in line with the business needs and strategy of the Bank. 
Senior Consultant, PwC Technology Consulting — 2014-2015 
Location: Vietnam 
Senior member of the PwC Technology Consulting team which undertook in-
depth review of business needs to recommend the best fit for purpose 
technology solutions. 
Senior Consultant,  EY Advisory Services — 2012-2014 
Location: Vietnam 
Senior member of EY IT Advisory team which delivered business analysis and 
technology consulting services for large corporations and government bodies.  
Product Analyst/Developer, Sitefinders Net (UK) — 2010-2012 
Location: United Kingdom 
Product analyst/developer for Sitefinders Net Ltd, a online services company 
based in Coventry, UK which ran a portfolio of personal finance websites 
including savings.co.uk and mortgages.co.uk. Main duties included researching 
and developing features to increase usability and traffic of the sites. 
Notable Projects 
Lazada E-Wallet, 2017

GoBear Vietnam - GoBear.com/vn, 2016

Techcombank Mobile Banking Review, 2015

HDBank IT Review, 2015

Agribank IT Strategy Development, 2014

Education 
Aston Business School, UK — BSc in Business and IT, 2010.

ISACA — Certified Information System Auditor (CISA), 2013.

CPA Australia — Candidate

Achievements  
Employee of the Quarter, Techombank Internal Audit, Q1 2016 
Employee of the Month, Techcombank Internal Audit, Dec 2015 & May 2016. 
Double Promoter, EY Advisory Services, 2013. 
�2
Top 5% Global CISA Exam Scorer, ISACA, Sep 2013. 
Scholarship for Outstanding Students Studying Abroad, Vietnam Ministry of 
Education, 2006 - 2010. 
Skills 
Scrum development framework 
RFP/RFI development for technology solution selection. 
Business system validation. 
Communication and stakeholders management 
Advanced business writing (English and Vietnamese). 
Software development. 
References 
Available upon request.
�3
